SELECT u.id, u.username, u.nickname, u.email, u.avatar, u.status, u.last_login as lastLogin, u.created_at as createdAt, COUNT(c.id) as commentCount FROM user u LEFT JOIN comment c ON u.id = c.user_id
AND u.status = #{status}
AND ( u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR u.email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') )
GROUP BY u.id ORDER BY u.created_at DESC
